snippet.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: The Secret of the Ooze 35th Anniversary - Official Trailer (2026)
snippet.description:
Go Ninja Go! Check out the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: The Secret of the Ooze 35th Anniversary trailer for the upcoming 35th anniversary theatrical re-release of the film. Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: The Secret of The Ooze 35th Anniversary opens in theatres nationwide for a week from March 13 - 19, 2026, and tickets are now on sale. 

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2: The Secret of the Ooze will be presented in theatres in a newly restored 4K presentation. In addition to the feature presentation, the anniversary event will include a never-before-seen featurette, The Ninja Turtles: Revolutions, appearing before the movie—step into the mind of TMNT co-creator Kevin Eastman, joining him on a vision through the past. Sit down alongside the icon at his personal drawing desk while he illustrates through the revolving history and mythos of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles legend.
tags: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
